Meeting Schedule
----------------

View the [2026 Township Council Meeting Schedule (PDF)](https://www.bloomfieldtwpnj.com/DocumentCenter/View/16593/2026-Council-Meeting-Schedule-PDF).

Meeting Documents
-----------------

Council Agendas, Minutes, Ordinances, and Resolutions can be found by visiting [IQM2 Intelligent Meeting Management](http://bloomfieldtownnj.iqm2.com/Citizens/Default.aspx).

Open Public Meetings Act
------------------------

The township follows the requirements of [N.J.S.A 10:4-12](http://ogtf.lpcnj.org/OPMA.htm), the public comment portion of the Open Public Meetings Act, commonly known as the Sunshine Law.

This information is available to engage the public on the [Bloomfield Open Public Records page](https://www.bloomfieldtwpnj.com/1491/Bloomfield-Open-Public-Records-Portal).

Video Coverage of Past Meetings
-------------------------------

Please see video versions of past meetings on [Bloomfield WBMA Television](http://www.wbmatv.com/media-center).

![Bloomfield, New Jersey Crest and Building](https://www.bloomfieldtwpnj.com/ImageRepository/Document?documentID=563)

Meetings
--------

* 7 p.m.
* Municipal Building  
  1 Municipal Plaza Bloomfield, NJ 07003  
  Mayor's Council Chambers

Agendas & Minutes
-----------------

Agendas are available prior to the meetings. Minutes are available following approval.

[View Recent Agendas and Minutes](http://bloomfieldtownnj.iqm2.com/Citizens/Default.aspx)
